attributes.action: to help not just preserve the Red Squirrel but extend its range by givng the Greys contraception
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This seems the most humane method to give greys contraceptive rather just trying hold the tide back of the Grey Squirrel advance. Many will never see Red Squirrels unless they travel long distances. We are to blame and we should find some form balancing the situation
